What is it?

A session with a member of our team for 42 minutes, to speak about design, development or digital strategy.

‚è≤

But, how does it work?

It's easy! First, you need to a meeting with one of our experts using the form below. Then, you come with your questions / bugs / objectives for us to discuss.

üëª

The OOHAA happens once per month, on a Friday afternoon. You can come to us with a problem, an idea, or just for a chin-wag.

Yes, absolutely! It's something we do to improve ourselves. To have an understanding of your problems and to try to help you solve them, helps us too!
